LoadProfile: OPTIONAL ADD HOURLY LOAD PROFILE OR COMMERCIAL REFERENCE BUILDING INFORMATION

PV.max_kw: SET TO ZERO IF DEFAULT IS NO SOLAR

Storage.max_kwh: SET TO ZERO IF DEFAULT IS NO STORAGE
Storage.max_kw: SET TO ZERO IF DEFAULT IS NO STORAGE
Storage.installed_cost_us_dollars_per_kwh: CHANGE COSTS BELOW TO BATTERY COSTS
Storage.canGridCharge: SET TO FALSE IF BATTERY CAN ONLY CHARGE FROM PV
